Introduction

HADY (Korean: 하디; Japanese: ハディ) was a girl group under Kings Entertainment consisting of four members: Dayoung, Areum, Yerin and Haena. They debuted on September 30, 2015 with the digital single Hello and later disbanded in January 2017.
